title: El Camino Real de Tierra Adentro National Historic Trail: Audio Description Videos
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Photos & Multimedia     Audio Description Videos              Audio Description Videos              Take a Journey Along El Camino Real   Loading the player...       Visit JWPlayer docs for keyboard shortcuts  Duration:6 minutes, 32 seconds  Take a journey along this historic route to discover the people, places, and events that have shaped Mexico, New Mexico, and America. In this film, we take you to El Camino Real Historic Trail Site and along Jornada del Muerto, south of Socorro, New Mexico.               A Child's Story of Socorro   Loading the player...       Visit JWPlayer docs for keyboard shortcuts  Duration:7 minutes, 56 seconds  Cottonwood Valley Charter School 6th graders perform what happened when Spanish colonizer Juan de Oñate arrived at the Pueblo of Teypana  from Mexico City in 1598 (the pueblo was near present-day Socorro, 138 miles south of Santa Fe).               The Children of Spanish Colonial Times   Loading the player...       Visit JWPlayer docs for keyboard shortcuts  Duration:4 minutes, 36 seconds  Children in the 1700s worked alongside their family members, but they also had fun! In this video we travel to El Rancho de las Golondrinas (14 miles south of Santa Fe) to experience the children's lives.
